data.text: @CDCgov My school already knows that if they come near him with a test, I will not only go after the school board, I will sue them each PERSONALLY. You stay out of my parental responsibilities.
@CDCgov HEY! TEACHER LEAVE THOSE KIDS ALONE!
@CDCgov Where were you jagasses about flu and pneumonia for 50 years, that caused more childhood deaths than Covid? And yes, smug ones, I am a doctor.
@CDCgov How is that possible with inaccuracies in PCR tests?
@CDCgov China hide the truth and spread the virus since 2019

@CDCgov If they had the technology to gene edit a viruses and that same technology is used to create mRNA vaccines.. why not create a less lethal but more contagious version of the virus?
could’ve inoculated the world for free… instead of charging for vaccines by the shot? Profit$
@CDCgov But, what do you mean by "regular" testing, how many times in 1 week? And, do you have a workflow to make it happen?
@CDCgov I’d recommend you read the Pfizer documents released yesterday with 9 pages of horrific side effects
